document.title: Georgia Standards of Excellence CTEA Marketing

30753DE0456E4ABC94A14C90D99856A8.description: Explore the local, state, and national opportunities available to students through participation in DECA including but not limited to conferences, competitions, community service, philanthropy, and other DECA activities.
